name: Paralell Ally
description:
I made this game for the Lost Relic games game jam. It took 8 days to make a game that can be played from start to finish in around 10 minutes. 

This game is about reconnecting the split parts of yourself. 

Enjoy controlling two players in this 2D platformer while you are tethered together. 

This can be played on a keyboard or controller, but it does play better on a controller. 

Please share your reviews in the comments and I will update the game with suggestions that fit.
